title: Activity-Based Instructional Design Utilizing Digital Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and intermediate-level expertise in the field (science)
context.additional_context: Professional training for medical/legal/tech professionals to design activity-based lessons in digital environments (tablets, interactive whiteboards provided), with formative assessments to monitor progress

learning_goals: Learners can explain activity-based instructional design principles tailored to digital environments.
Learners can design at least three digital learning activities that reflect the characteristics of adult professional learners.
Learners can apply digital tool utilization strategies for effectively delivering scientific content to real-world classroom scenarios
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
